column1: #Text=This is not a tax to come, live and work in Canada.
#Text=It is a sales tax on a real estate transaction.
#Text=It only applies to purchases within Greater Vancouver of residential properties by foreign nationals, corporations or trustees.
#Text=If they want to purchase a property but avoid the tax, they can purchase outside the district.So the answer to 'is this a head tax' is unequivocally no.
